DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , open label , non-controlled Phase IIa trial . Patients first stage T.b . gambiense sleep sickness receive 100 mg DB289 orally twice day 5 day . Subjects meet entry criterion enrol single site . A total 30 patient enrolled trial . Enrollment plan begin third quarter 2001 complete 2-3 month . The study conduct Trypanosomiasis Reference Center , Viana ( ICCT ) , Angola , Trypanosomiasis Treatment Center Maluku , Congo .
